meta.name: Tours of STEM Colleges
meta.info: STEM Colleges of UC at Santa Cruz

pinterest.name: Jack Baskin School of Engineering
pinterest.info: It was a building with a post office on the first floor, the mathematics department on the second floor, classrooms on the third, a financial aid office on the fourth, and (occasionally) telescopes on the roof.

pinterest.name: BioMed
pinterest.info: UCSC's Division of Physical and Biological Sciences (PBSci) and the Jack Baskin School of Engineering (SOE) support a broad range of biomedical research.

pinterest.name: Science and Engineering Library
pinterest.info: home to the campus' collection of science publications and texts.

pinterest.name: Sinsheimer Labs
pinterest.info: a fearsome building with foreboding signs..

pinterest.name: Division of Physical and Biological Sciences
pinterest.info: Home to physical and biological majors.

pinterest.name: Thinmann Lectures
pinterest.info: the largest lecture room on Science Hill.

pinterest.name: Center for Adaptive Optics
pinterest.info: a building dedicated to the pursuit of more accurate imaging through ground-based telescopes.
